source.name: Lab 7.1 conversation flows location
source.instructions: **Where do user-facing conversation flows (e.g. greet, help, contact) live in the Level 1 project?**
source.learningObjectives: SWBAT identify where user-facing conversation flows are located in the Level 1 project structure
source.guidance: The correct answer is level1/data/basics/. User-facing flows are stored in the data/basics/ directory (e.g. greet.yml, help.yml, contact.yml, goodbye.yml). The other directories serve different purposes: data/system/patterns/ contains system patterns, domain/ holds responses, and models/ contains generated files.
